mapper.select: SELECT b.board_seq , b.board_type_seq , bt.board_type_nm , b.title , b.content, b.hit , b.del_yn , b.reg_dtm , b.reg_member_seq , b.update_dtm , b.update_member_seq, m.member_id, (SELECT m.member_nm FROM member m WHERE b.reg_member_seq = m.member_seq)as "regMemberId", (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM board_attach ba WHERE ba.board_type_seq = b.board_type_seq AND ba.board_seq = b.board_seq)as "attachCnt", (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM board_comment bc WHERE bc.board_seq = b.board_seq AND bc.board_type_seq = b.board_type_seq)as "commentCnt" FROM board b JOIN board_type bt ON bt.board_type_seq = b.board_type_seq JOIN member m ON m.member_seq = b.reg_member_seq WHERE bt.board_type_seq = 3 ORDER BY b.board_seq DESC LIMIT ${start}, ${size}
SELECT count(*) FROM board WHERE board_type_seq = 3

SELECT b.board_seq , b.board_type_seq , bt.board_type_nm , b.title , b.content, b.hit , b.del_yn , b.reg_dtm , b.reg_member_seq , b.update_dtm , b.update_member_seq, m.member_id, (SELECT m.member_nm FROM member m WHERE b.reg_member_seq = m.member_seq)as "regMemberId" FROM board b JOIN board_type bt ON bt.board_type_seq = b.board_type_seq JOIN member m ON m.member_seq = b.reg_member_seq WHERE 1 = 1 AND b.board_seq = #{boardSeq}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM forum.board WHERE board_seq=#{boardSeq} AND board_type_seq=#{boardTypeSeq};
